rukus.text: 35|15|Renmen a! Nimen cai shi xuqiu an la de, an la que shi wu qiu de, que shi ke song de.
35|16|Ruguo ta yiyu, ta jiang huimie nimen, er chuangzao xin de zhongsheng.
35|17|Na dui an la bushi fannan de.

35|18|Yige fu zui zhe, bu zai fu bieren de zui; yige fuzhong zui zhe, ruguo jiao bieren lai ti ta fu zui, namo, bieren sui shi ta de jinqin, ye buneng ti ta danfu yi sihao. Ni zhi neng jinggao zai mimi zhong jingwei zhu, qie jin shou bai gong zhe. Xidi shenxin zhe, zhi wei ziji er xidi. An la shi weiyi de guisu.
35|21|beiyin he dang yang ye bu xiangdeng,
35|22|huo ren he siren ye bu xiangdeng. An la bi shi ta suo yiyu zhe neng tingwen, ni jue buneng shi zai fen zhong de ren neng tingwen,
35|24|Wo que yi shi ni ben zhenli er wei baoxi zhe he jinggao zhe. Meiyou yige minzu ze yi, zhiyao you yige minzu, qizhong jiu you jinggao zhe cengjing shiqule.
35|25|Ruguo tamen fouren ni, name, zai tamen zhiqian shiqu zhe, yi fourenle; tamen zu zhong de shizhe ceng zhaoshi tamen mingzheng, tian jing he canlan de jingdian.
35|26|Ranhou, wo cheng fa liao bu xindao zhe, wo de qianze shi zenyang de?
